attributes.action: Make a Michael van Gerwen Darts Funland
attributes.additional_details:
Can we please whack an enormous hollowed-out Michael van Gerwen head on the top of Big Ben, with loads of darts-themed slides and play areas?
It'd be awesome... there'd be loads of green lasers and stuff - and every time you went down one of the big slides, Russ Bray's voice would boom out "18000000!!!"
If not... maybe some sort of a Denis Ovens-themed water park at one of the old Olympic buildings.
Cheers.
